Installing Eclipse Monkey

Eclipse Monkey is installed using the Eclipse Update Manager pointing to the Project Dash update site http://download.eclipse.org/technology/dash/update/.

Simple Instructions

1. Open the Update Manager.

2. Create a Project Dash remote update site. (Select it and press "Finish".)

3. Select the Eclipse Monkey feature. (Use "Next", agree to various licenses, and press "Finish".)

Samples and Examples

Eclipse Monkey comes with a few example scripts. To install the examples, use the Create the examples project toolbar button:

or the Create Examples Monkey menu item: (note: this handy menu item vanishes once you have created at least one script - using the logic that if you've written a script, you don't need the examples)

Then you'll have a small collection of sample and example scripts loaded into a new project named "Eclipse Monkey Examples":
